did.description: goban layout should have a header, 3 columns, footer for descriptions
did.title: create goban board layout

did.description:
when we hover over a taks the footer should display a description of the task. 
 this task should have name, date, description
did.title: properly preview task and its description

did.description:
We should also be able to select one of our tasks that are premade and edit the item.
 only have the ability to change the title and the description
did.title: create edit tasks

did.description:
Now we have most of the navigation down.
 We need to be able to create a task and add it to this json 
 should have a task name, task description, date created (which should be auto generated)
 Note we need to do some stuff with writing to json to persist!
did.title: create add tasks

did.description: We should also be able to delete one our tasks
did.title: create delete tasks

did.description: we should be able to move items to the left or to the right
did.title: functionality to move items

did.description: we need to be able to navigate through each column with VIM bindings of course
did.title: enable navigation

did.description: I want to be able to add some sort of priority to the items that I have listed. Should be able to move items up and down a column by simply using Shift+K and Shift+J respectively
did.title: add functionality to move items up/down

doing.description:
Goban only has one place to store current todos/doings/dids. 
 We want to be able to separate tasks based on the project that we are currently in. Should be able to navigate through projects with the UI adjusting accordingly
doing.title: support multi project functionality

todo.description: Want to turn Goban into a one-stop shop for productivity. we have a Kanban board but now I want to include a little pomodoro setup and move on from there. The goal is to live in this little TUI. Do everything here, live and die by the Goban
todo.title: pomodoro

todo.description: We should also be able to delete one our tasks
todo.title: need to be able to archive past todos

todo.description: set a dynamic ending for titles and descriptions
todo.title: make UI pretty please

todo.description: theres a lot of code reuse in jsoner.go and is sorta ugly, i want to fix it
todo.title: refactor jsoner.go

todo.description: theres a lot of messy code and ugly if statements in column.go lets make it somewhat understandable
todo.title: refactor column.go
